attributes.action: Bring Tony Blair to account over the war in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that Iraq is finally winding down and our troops are beginning their withdrawal there still remains the unanswered question of Weapons Of Mass Destruction which was the excuse used by Tony Blair to enter into this illegal and immoral war in the first place.
The public should now be calling for Tony Blair to be brought to account in a Court of Law for the deaths of the 179 of our own service personnel who have been killed in iraq.
These service people died because of a LIE told to this country by the then prime Minister Tony Blair.
This petition is calling for every right thinking person in Britain to demand that Tony Blair be made answer in a Court of Law over the deaths of our service personnel and the LIE about Weapons Of Mass Destruction that was used which brought about those deaths.
